channel.title: Mammals on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Mammals on ZooBerry

item.title: African Golden Cat
item.description: A medium-sized cat with polymorphic coat colors found in tropical rainforests.

item.title: Coyote
item.description: A smaller relative of the wolf, the adaptable coyote thrives in all biomes.

item.title: Fishing Cat
item.description: Fishing cats are solitary and found in a variety of watery habitats. Includes skins, icons, and sound files.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: European Pack I
item.description: The first part of our little project, contains the European Mouflon, the Highland Cow and the Shire Horse!

item.title: South America Pack
item.description: This pack contains six animals from South America and is downloaded in one file.

item.title: Gibbon Pack
item.description: A pack of three different gibbons to bring some variety to your zoos’ primate sections.

item.title: Wisent
item.description: This ungulate is also known as the European bison. Some authors consider it and the American bison to be conspecific.

item.title: Bat Eared Fox
item.description: These foxes live in the scrub, savannah and grasslands of Africa.

item.title: Douglas Squirrel
item.description: The Douglas squirrel lives from the Sierra Nevada mountains north through coastal British Colombia.

item.title: Hexaprotodon Pack
item.description: Three extinct hippopotamids from the genus Hexaprotodon.

item.title: Rainbow Hippos
item.description: An adorable pygmy hippo for every color of the rainbow!

item.title: Rainbow Hippos Part 2: NOT Rainbow Hippos
item.description: What comes after the colors of the rainbow? The colors of the not rainbow apparently.

item.title: African Safari Pack
item.description: Summary of the African Safari Pack project

item.title: Megafauna Pack
item.description: A megafauna pack made by Zooasaurus.

item.title: African Civet and Giant Eland
item.description: A Civet from the tropics of Africa, Biome is Tropical Rainforest and Savannah. Giant Eland is one of the largest antelope in the world, lives in the Savannahs of East Africa.

item.title: Fringe Eared Oryx
item.description: The Fringe-Eared Oryx is a scrub dwelling antelope. It is a subspecies of gemsbok native to southern Africa.

item.title: Yellow Mongoose
item.description: An African mongoose. Its main biome is scrub. Will not dig under chain link fences!

item.title: Pygmy Goat
item.description: The Pygmy Goat is a grassland animal that all of the guests love.

item.title: Long-Tailed Weasel
item.description: This is a North American weasel for ZT2. It contains 2 variants (not shown) - white and brown with light facial markings.

item.title: Miniature Pony
item.description: A miniature pony! for your zoo! =D
